text: This is a list of Italian television related events from 1990. ==Events== *21 March - Italy wins the 35th Eurovision Song Contest in Zagreb, SR Croatia, Yugoslavia. The winning song is "Insieme: 1992", performed by Toto Cutugno. ==Debuts== ===International=== *25 September - / Alfred J. Kwak (Italia 1) (1989-1990) */ Babar (Rai 2) (1989-1991) ==Television shows== ==Ending this year== ==Births== ==Deaths== ==See also== *List of Italian films of 1990
title: 1990 in Italian television
